body_html: We're currently mulling over a design for this feature. It seems feasible to extend the feed_dict mechanism so that it would be possible to feed a placeholder based on the output of another operation, but it will require some care to ensure that the resulting graph is valid.
body_text: We're currently mulling over a design for this feature. It seems feasible to extend the feed_dict mechanism so that it would be possible to feed a placeholder based on the output of another operation, but it will require some care to ensure that the resulting graph is valid.
body: We're currently mulling over a design for this feature. It seems feasible to extend the `feed_dict` mechanism so that it would be possible to feed a placeholder based on the output of another operation, but it will require some care to ensure that the resulting graph is valid.
